keywords_array: "Nerve impulse","Cell body","Dendrites","Axon","Axon terminals","Myelin sheath","Nodes of Ranvier","Synaptic vesicles","Synapse","Ganglia"
keywords_explanation_array: "The electrical wave transmitted along a nerve fiber.","The part of a neuron containing the nucleus.","Threadlike extensions of the cytoplasm of a neuron. ","A long, slender projection of a nerve cell that conducts electrical impulses away from the neuron cell body.","The club-shaped endings by which axons make synaptic contacts with other nerve cells or with effector cells.","The cover that surrounds some nerve cells. It speeds up the impulse transmission.","The short gap between the myelin sheath of a nerve fiber.","The membrane-bound vesicle near the presynaptic membrane that mediates the passage of nerve impulses across the junction.","A junction across which nerve impulse passes from axon terminal to a neuron.","A group of nerve cells external to the brain or spinal cord."
